activities: We provide a Software as a Service solution for people and businesses that want to create appointments. The personal information we receive is name and email address as part of the account creation. When an invitation is offered we also keep the email address of the intended recipient. Optionally the address and phone number of the account owner may be included. We use Zuora Systems (http://www.zuora.com ) for our online credit card billing. Zora is a PCI and DSS compliant system (https://www.zuora.com/privacy.html).
eucountries: Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
